document_data.name: ''Bracers of dexterity''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bracers of dexterity''''' were enchanted [[bracer]]s created to aid masters of martial arts of [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Powers: ''Bracers of dexterity'' enhanced the wearer's dexterity. These items came in many different enchantment power levels.
document_data.History: Sages and historians believed the ''bracers of dexterity'' originally came from the far eastern land of Kara-Tur. They were created to enhance the martial artists' abilities, making them almost impossible to strike. These magical bracers were first mentioned in historical recordings of the visit of far-eastern travelers to the sword coast, even though though sages thought these records unreliable.
document_data.Notable Owners:
*[[Alhelor]] in [[Port Last]], ''circa'' [[1372 DR]] had ''bracers of dexterity'' in his store's inventory.
*[[Oleff Uskar]] on the [[Halls of Justice]] in Neverwinter ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].
*[[Ophala Cheldarstorn]] owed a pair of ''bracers of dexterity'' of the ''+3'' enchantment.
*[[Neurik]] of the Temple of Tyr in [[Neverwinter]] ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].
